title: Market Sentiment Dashboard
description: Real-time dashboard for visualizing sentiment in financial news using FastAPI and Dash. Containerized with Docker for rapid deployment.

title: Backtest Engine
description: Modular high-performance C++ backtesting engine with tick-level simulation and plug-and-play strategies. Dockerized for easy execution.

title: ARIMA & Technical Analysis
description: End-to-end time series modeling combining ARIMA forecasting with technical indicators (RSI, MACD, Bollinger) for financial time series analysis and signal detection.

title: SLV Calibration
description: Python implementation of the local-stochastic volatility (SLV) model calibration using particle methods and numerical optimization. Visual results included.

title: Two-Factor Bergomi Model
description: Numerical implementation of the two-factor Bergomi stochastic volatility model. Includes calibration routines, simulation, and analysis of volatility surfaces.
